content: And I would say also the extreme condition of the gas and LNG markets that as you can see, starting from September, experienced record price levels across the globe, which if you want, triggered the opportunity for us to use options that were deeply out of the money before, and that became in the money with this level of prices. About the tax rate of the tax, let's say, fluctuation within the third and last quarter and the next quarter, as I mentioned, the tax of it is impacted by the mix of our results and particularly by the fact that now there is a significant material contribution of value coming from certain countries or certain business with low tax rate.
